summary: WHILE EXITING THE HIGHWAY THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE DEALER HAD BEEN CONTACTED.   *NLM  THE CONSUMER BELIEVED THE PROBLEMS MAY  BE ATTRIBUTED TO ELECTRICAL PROBLEMS, THE CONSUMER STATED THERE WAS A BURNING SMELL COMING FROM THE VEHICLE.  *JB   *NM   WHILE EXITING THE HIGHWAY THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE DEALER HAD BEEN CONTACTED.   *NLM  THE CONSUMER BELIEVED THE PROBLEMS MAY  BE ATTRIBUTED TO ELECTRICAL PROBLEMS, THE CONSUMER STATED THERE WAS A BURNING SMELL COMING FROM THE VEHICLE.  *JB   *NM  THE VEHICLE WAS UNABLE TO FIXED.  THE VEHICLE STALLED AGAIN AFTER A RECENT ATTEMPT TO REPAIR.  (THE CONSUMER REQUESTED ODI TO PLEASE REFERNCE TO ODI#10065760 WHO HAS EXPERIENCED THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM.)   *SC  *JB
